title: Why does the 80s song 'Seasons Change' by Exposé make me feel such deep sorrow? - Quora

response.answer_text: Maybe this song is subconciously a trigger from a past event in ur life. Or some songs just hit us different ways. Ultimately muscians make music that moves our soul. Thats how they make there millions too!! For me in my life theres a song for almost every memory I have. Music is BIG 4 me. Every now and then a song will play, anywhere from old school, R& B or Hip Hop( with a hook) and I'll get all teary eyes!! Its a cool feeling. Or basically im just to darn emotional lol!!

Because the time we have on this Earth is finite and full of sorrow and loss. The fact that we may never feel the way we once did can be a good thing, however we mostly only contemplate such thoughts after hardships.
